docs.lead_paragraph: IT taken a long time, but hypnosis is finally well on the way to establishing its place in medicine on a firmer basis than ever before.

headline.main: Hypnotism Out of the Shadows; After 175 years of controversy, its nature remains a mystery, but recent studies have shown its value in medicine.

docs.abstract: J Pfeiffer article on history and med value; Mesmer role recalled
docs.snippet: IT taken a long time, but hypnosis is finally well on the way to establishing its place in medicine on a firmer basis than ever before.
